DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose is to describe the pattern of Belatacept use at the time of transplant and up to three years post-transplantation for all Belatacept treated patients.
DOC.brief_title: Patterns of Use of Belatacept: Analysis of Data From the Collaborative Transplant Study
DOC.detailed_description: Time Perspective: Prospective design, Retrospective data collection and analysis
DOC.criteria: Patients who received solid organ transplantation during study period in one of the transplant centers involved in CTS
